name: Eternal Guardian Rubine: The First Fight
summary: ETERNAL GUARDIAN RUBINE -The First Fight- is a hair trigger 3D run-and-gun-and-sting inspired by many action games from the 90s, but mainly Sin & Punishment, Alien Soldier, Cannon Spike, and Radiant Silvergun. You as the bio-mechanical superweapon Rubine must use your entire arsenal to blast through various overstimulating levels across multiple small scenarios while racking up the biggest high score you can.

name: Butty Buttbear's Big Butty Blast
summary: Survival horror game, inspired by the FNAF series.

name: Minecraft: Spring to Life
summary: Spring to Life is an update to Minecraft: Bedrock Edition which adds warm and cold variants to various passive animal mobs, new foliage blocks to biomes, and ambience features such as sounds and falling leaf particles.

name: Minecraft: Spring to Life
summary: Spring to Life is an update to Minecraft: Java Edition which adds warm and cold variants to various passive animal mobs, new foliage blocks to biomes, and ambience features such as sounds and falling leaf particles.

name: Trials of Innocence
summary: Trials of Innocence is an indie courtroom detective game. Step into the shoes of the main character, rookie lawyer Luna Ray, and navigate her journey through the legal world. Unravel a shocking conspiracy that changes the fate of many, including herself, and confront her inner choices.

name: Infinity Nikki: Revelry Season
summary:
Behind every mask lies a wilder fantasy. Under the spotlight, wishes burn brighter than the sun!

Dance! Let the rhythm of joy guide your feet. Step onto the world's stage and witness this fantastic party.

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Seekers of Eternity
summary: The Patch 7.2 series update includes: New Main Scenario Quests, a new Dungeon, a new Raid, a new Trial, Cosmic Exploration, a new Large-scale Battle-oriented Duty – Occult Crescent, New Allied Society Quests – Mamool Ja, new Hildibrand Quests, Duty Support Additions, and PvP Updates

name: Ezrebeth
summary: Ezrebeth is an old, bitter recluse who finds herself constantly invaded by her peculiar relatives during the winter holidays. Oh, and she's stuck in a time loop! Investigate, interview and cross-reference as you attempt to figure out what's going on in this surreal visual novel.

name: Paper 2: Origami Refolded
summary: Fold your way through over 100 levels and become an origami master in this casual puzzle game suitable for all ages.

name: Spooky Survivors
summary: Spooky Survivors puts you in the shoes of Van Hobo, a quirky hero battling the supernatural! Start with all unlocks BUT choose which to level up as you face endless waves. Equip powerful gear and unlock unique abilities. Outlast the nightmare and prove yourself as the ultimate spooky survivor!

name: Red or Blue
summary: Red or Blue? Your choice decides life or death

name: Digital Revolution
summary: This is a casual game that combines math and basic elimination gameplay. If you're confident in your math skills, give it a try! In the game, you'll decide the direction of all the "blocks" and gradually strengthen the "Blue Legion" to defeat the evil "Red Legion."

name: Mutant Slime: Survivor Team
summary: Is an arena shooting light rogue-like game, players will use slimes to destroy invading unknown creatures in the game.

name: Tactics Unlimited
summary:
Tactics Unlimited innovatively combines elements of traditional sports management games, role-playing games (RPGs), and turn-based tactics, creating a deeply immersive experience that balances strategy, management, and action on the pitch.

It is a modern 3D football game that brings fresh energy to the genre by combining strategy, management, and on-field action into an immersive experience. With its realistic graphics, players are treated to lifelike depictions of stadiums, players, and in-game dynamics.

name: Breakout Beyond
summary: Breakout is back! In this neon-drenched take on the classic, you’ll need to literally break through each puzzle by clearing bricks to breach the final goal. Rack up a combo and create spectacular light shows alone or with a friend.

name: Boo! Are you scared?
summary: "Boo! Are you scared?" – game with realistic physics of collisions and destruction, where every step can be the last. Gloomy levels full of dangerous obstacles and bottomless abysses await you.

name: Wave Defense: Trappist
summary: Gear up and get going! Defend your outposts from waves of alien enemies with your mech. Build and upgrade your base, protecting the extraction of the mysterious planetary system’s rich resources!
